author: peter_firmstone
msg: Added inversion to PermissionGrant interface, removed Exclusion interface and Deny implementation.  Inversion allows implementation of Denial in policy provider, rather than directly by the PermissionGrant.  Added CodeSourceSetGrant, which allows grant's to apply to a number of CodeSource's, to assist implementation of undocumented java policy file features.

author: hughesj
msg: Releasing from branch so modify the <scm> element
